name: World's First Cellular-based Continuous Glucose Monitoring Product
description: Developed the world's first cellular-based continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) product with companion mobile app, enabling real-time diabetes management and remote patient monitoring with significant improvement in patient adherence.
challenge: Creating an innovative CGM solution that could operate independently without requiring smartphone proximity, while providing comprehensive data sharing capabilities with healthcare providers, family members, and clinical services. The system needed multi-language support and integration with various third-party health portals.
solution: Built a revolutionary cellular-enabled CGM device with companion mobile application featuring real-time glucose monitoring, automated data sharing with approved healthcare professionals and family networks, multi-language support (Spanish and French), integration with multiple third-party health portals for value-based care plans, and comprehensive diabetes management tools.
outcomes: Significant improvement in diabetes management and patient adherence
Improved care coordination between patients and providers
Seamless integration with value-based care programs
keyFeatures: Cellular-enabled CGM device for independent operation
Real-time glucose data transmission and alerts
Companion mobile app with comprehensive dashboards
Automated data sharing with healthcare networks
